label: Get Bot Version
name: getBotVersionAwsLex
description: Returns metadata information for a specific bot. You must provide the bot name and the bot version or alias.

inputs.label: Bot Name
inputs.name: botName
inputs.description: The name of the bot. The name is case sensitive.

inputs.label: versionoralias
inputs.name: Version or alias
inputs.description: The version or alias of the bot.
